Tolkien-related events that took place in 1981.

content.title: January
content.content:
10 - Actor Richard Boone dies.
28 - Actor Elijah Wood is born.
29 - J.A.W. Bennett, Inkling, dies.

content.title: March
content.content:
8 - The first episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
10 - Amon Hen 49 is published.
15 - The second episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
22 - The third episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
29 - The fourth episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
? - Beyond Bree March 1981 is published.

content.content:

19 - The seventh episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
26 - The eighth episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
? - Beyond Bree April 1981 is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
2 - Amon Hen 50 is published.
3 - The ninth episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
4 - Actor Trystan Gravelle is born.
10 - The tenth episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
17 - The eleventh episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
24 - The twelfth episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
29 - The Atlas of Middle-earth by Karen Wynn Fonstad is published
31 - The thirteenth episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
? - Beyond Bree May 1981 is published.
? - Mallorn 16 is published.

content.content:

content.content:
5 - The eighteenth episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
12 - The nineteenth episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
17 - The Tolkien Quiz Book, the book by Robinson and Wilson, is published.
19 - The twentieth episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
26 - The twenty-first episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
? - Beyond Bree July 1981 is published.

content.content:

23 - The twenty-fifth episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
30 - The twenty-sixth and last episode of the radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
? - Beyond Bree August 1981 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
12 - Author and librarian William Ready dies.
16 - Arthedain, the Norwegian Tolkien Society, is founded in Oslo.
18 - Extracts from J.R.R. Tolkien's "The Name Coventry" is published in The Catholic Herald.
22 - The Dutch Tolkien Society Unquendor is founded in Leiden.
25-27 - Oxonmoot 1981

content.content:

? - England and Always: Tolkien's World of the Rings by Jared Lobdell is published.
